channel.title: ASCII password decryption, PI

item.title: ASCII password decryption, PI
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Useful in some scenarios.

	final String s = "10911111297114115107101112";
        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
        Matcher matcher = Pattern.compile("(1..|[2-9].)").matcher(s);
            while(matcher.find())
                sb.append( (char) Integer.parseInt(matcher.group()));
        System.out.println(sb.toString());

Read full topic
